this spell will damage & curse you: This spell will damage & curse you
are you sure you want to disconnect from: Are you sure you want to disconnect from this server?
are you sure you want to end your turn w: Are you sure you want to end your turn without moving or casting?
how to move description: Hold right mouse button to walk towards your cursor.
how to stack description: Many spells become more powerful if you stack multiple in a row.  Try combining different spells to find out how they might interact.
click somewhere on the grass to choose a: Click somewhere on the grass to choose a spawn point
hold right mouse button to walk towards: Hold right mouse button to walk towards your cursor
move into the portal to go to the next l: Move into the portal to go to the next level
click on a spell from your toolbar to qu: Click on a spell from your toolbar to queue it up and then click on a target to cast it
cast more than once in a single turn: Cast more than once in a single turn
move the camera with w,a,s, and d keys o: Move the camera with W,A,S, and D keys or by holding and dragging Middle Mouse Button
recenter the camera with the z key: Recenter the camera with the Z key
pickup a spell scroll to get more spells: Pickup a spell scroll to get more spells
mouserebinderror: This mouse button has reserved functionality and may not be rebound
